title: Longest Iterable Object Identification | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will write a function that takes any number of iterable objects or objects with a length property and returns the longest one using the `max()` function with `len()` as the `key`.

meta.title: Longest Iterable Object Identification Challenge
meta.description: Discover the longest iterable object in a set of inputs with this engaging programming challenge.
meta.keywords: python playground, challenge, python, iterable, length, max, programming

verify.name: Verify Python Script Execution in Temporary Directory
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 识别最长的可迭代对象 | 挑战
i18n.description: 在这个挑战中，你将编写一个函数，该函数接受任意数量的可迭代对象或具有长度属性的对象，并使用以 `len()` 作为 `key` 的 `max()` 函数返回最长的对象。

meta.title: 识别最长的可迭代对象挑战
meta.description: 通过这个有趣的编程挑战，找出一组输入中最长的可迭代对象。
meta.keywords: Python 游乐场, 挑战, Python, 可迭代对象, 长度, 最大值, 编程
